title: My Brother's Daddy's Wife
itunes:title: My Brother's Daddy's Wife
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 38 year old married man and I have a woman on the side that I’ve been with for about 3 months. She’s newly married but she calls me her maintenance man because of her husband’s age. He’s significantly older and she said he has a problem in the bedroom, so we hook up once or twice a week. I’m originally from Kansas and my mom and I moved to Georgia after she divorced my dad...................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
